references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

G. J. Simmons, On palindromic squares of non-palindromic numbers, J. Rec. Math., 5 (No. 1, 1972), 11-19. [Annotated scanned copy]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Thanks to Pierre Genix (Pierre.Genix(AT)wanadoo.fr) and _Harvey P. Dale_ who pointed out that there were errors in earlier versions of this sequence.
